welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bad Homburg, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and relaxing atmosphere. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take time to discover all that this lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, primarily used by Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited access for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for handling cargo shipments at Mainz Finthen Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
